resources.string: Welcome to Easy Authenticator! This wizard will guide you through the initial setup process. Please pay attention and read carefully in order to avoid losing data. \n\nDon\'t worry, you can still change any of these options later on in the Settings.
To ensure the security of your accounts, Easy Authenticator uses encryption to store account data. Here you can choose which method of encryption will be used.

The KeyStore is a system component of Android used to securely store cryptographic keys. The advantage of using the KeyStore is that the keys are stored separately from Easy Authenticator\'s data, and can be backed by hardware-based encryption (if your device supports it). However, as the keys are not stored with Easy Authenticator\'s data, this method prevents external backup solutions (like Titanium) from working. If you choose this method, you will have to rely on the internal backup functions provided by Easy Authenticator.\n\nWarning: The KeyStore is known to cause many problems, so please only use it if you absolutely have to. If you don\'t mind entering a password / PIN every time you start Easy Authenticator, it is highly recommended to use the password-based encryption instead.

This method will encrypt your data with a key generated from a password or PIN. The main advantage of using this method is that external backup solutions (like Titanium) will work as expected, and it is much less failure-prone than the KeyStore. However, you will have to enter your credentials every time you start Easy Authenticator.
Here you can setup an authentication method to lock Easy Authenticator. Since you have chosen Android KeyStore as your encryption method, this step is optional.
Here you can setup an authentication method to lock Easy Authenticator. Since you have chosen Password / PIN as your encryption method, a password or a PIN must be set to proceed.
Please set a password to continue!
Please set a PIN to continue!
Please confirm your password to continue!
Please confirm your PIN to continue!
Your settings have been saved, you are now all set to use Easy Authenticator!
